gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 126, Kings 121
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Kings, 126-121. Bennedict Mathurin recorded 25 points, four assists, and three rebounds for the Pacers, while T.J. McConnell added 20 points and 10 assists in the victory. Kevin Hurter tallied a career-high 31 points (7-12 3PM) and four assists for the Kings in the loss. The Pacers improve to 24-17, while the Kings fall 23-18.
